Class FhirServerConfigCommon

java.lang.Object
ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.starter.common.FhirServerConfigCommon
@Configuration @EnableTransactionManagement public class FhirServerConfigCommon extends Object
This is the primary configuration file for the example server
